text_block_list.text: After training, I find Sky looking up<n>something on her phone.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Sigh... The calm expression andthat curled up, innocent tail...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
And to retain so much detail, even<n>scaled down to fit in your
hand. Truly a<n>soul-soothing masterpiece...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ah. No worries, just me rambling.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
That reminds me, do you have any<n>plans on our next day
off?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I've been wanting to get some new<n>shoes and was
wondering if you<n>wanted to come with?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: All right, then let's hit the mall this<n>weekend!

And so, on our day off, I visit the mall<n>with Sky to look for
some shoes.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hmm, the sporting goods store<n>should be right around—

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Nah, I just saw something that caught<n>my eye for a second.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Look at those mugs they're selling at<n>that store over there.
They're rather<n>cute, aren't they?

I follow her gaze to a display rack of<n>mugs with whimsical
cat designs.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Aw...These kitties look so calm, like<n>they could fall asleep at
any moment.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I bet my motivation would skyrocket if<n>I could drink tea from
a mug like this<n>before training.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whatever shall I do? Maybe I'll get<n>it—ah!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Look! Over there!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
It says if you buy a set of two mugs,<n>they'll give you a free
cat-shaped key<n>chain!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: A super cute kitty key chain, allfor the measly price of two mugs!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It's a steal! They've reeled mein!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That said, I only need one mug.<n>Hmm...
Sky continues to act conflicted for a<n>little while longer...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: By the way, this is totally unrelated,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer... do you by chance have a<n>mug of your own?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: From what I can remember, I get thefeeling you don't, do you?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Whoa there, what are you implying?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I just passed here by chance when I<n>suddenly got the urge
to buy this kitty<n>mug. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
You could use a mug yourself, and<n>since you don't have
one, isn't this a<n>perfect opportunity?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Come on, just picture it—sipping tea<n>out of matching mugs
with your<n>trainee before training...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Doesn't it give off that "tightly-knit"<n>vibe? Lavishly lovely,
dont you think?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: At the very least, I certainly think so...<n>Hint, hint.
choice_data_list: If you want it that badly...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh, you're in?
choice_data_list: This'll make you more motivated, right?
This'll make you more motivated, right?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haha, that's my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I can count on you to keep your<n>trainee's motivation
peaked at all<n>times.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay then, let's buy one each.
choice_data_list: I'll buy both. Be right back.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

I leave Seiun Sky waiting as I walk<n>over to the register and
purchase two<n>mugs.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Man, you're so mature! That was<n>smooth!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: I didn't think you would buy my mug<n>too!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I think you just leveled up our bond<n>again. Da-dada-daaah!
♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you say that like you didn't<n>just buy me a present.
Be more<n>honest with yourself, you sly dog,<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
All right, as soon as we get back,<n>let's fill these bad boys
with some<n>tea!
